post.title: bell turbo stick and 10.6 osx
post.content: hey guys, so i read some threads on here regarding this and the driver links etc that i got from the threads didn;t help.. just wondering if there is an update on if this works? bell told me i am sol cause mc is not supported via 10.6 i got it to work once (had the sticks for a day) and since then it connects but no data is sent/received. any ideas?
